author: newmindflow
title: Showcase Film Industry Use-Case
description: The film industry could be a very powerful ally in the mainstream adoption of blockchain tech. How do we get decision-makers interested?
solution: Showcase a successful example of blockchain-enabled film distribution to attract the attention of key players in the industry.
experience: New Mindflow - 30 years of combined experience in film, TV, apps & games production.Creators of 2 successful CNFT projects: Trybbles & Icons
